message: @all I just pushed up some commits for the Project / Projects class implementing the new interface. However, I did run into some issues I'm hoping Mural or Tony might be able to take a look at. I was trying to run the ProjectsTest file specifically with a breakpoint in the setup() method so I could take a closer inspection of what was happening inside the new Projects initialize() method, but eclipse kept on saying there was a ClassNotFoundException and would just stop so I never received an opportunity to debug further so I could fully implement the initialize() method. If you have any suggestions please let me know and I can work on finalizing that one. The other dependency for Projects is that it requires the Teams class to be implemented too (because a list of teams for each project has to be added in).
